title: Impact Estimation Tool (IET) File
description: Schema for Impact Estimation Tool saved files. See docs/examples/sample-iet.json for an example.

$schema.description: Path or URL of this schema file. Example: 'docs/schema/iet.schema.json'

schemaVersion.description: Schema version for on-disk files. Initial version is 1.

qualityRequirements.description: List of Quality Requirements (rows). Order is significant and preserved in files/UI.

designIdeas.description: List of Design Ideas (columns). Order is significant and preserved in files/UI.

cells.description: Input cells mapping requirementId Ã— designId to an estimated value on the requirement's scale.

current.description: Current measured value on the unit's scale.

goal.description: Target (goal) value on the unit's scale.

id.description: Stable identifier for the design idea (e.g., 'IdeaA').

estimatedValue.description: Estimated new value on the requirement's unit scale.

confidence.description: +/- confidence range on the same scale (optional).
